name: Chicken Protector
description:
A cute and silly 3D first-person perspective mini-game. Dodge the eagles in the forest park, collect and rescue the chicks scattered all over the place!

Gameplay

- Press WASD to move

- Use the mouse to move and click to launch bullets to hit the eagles gathering in the air towards you

- Save 7 chicks in 60 seconds to win!

Platform Support

Production Engine: Unity

Available storage space required: 80M

Platform: PC (Windows/Mac)
